roleset.name: talk casually
roleset.note: GAB-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: gossip (37.6) (from gab.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: First (or all if in one constituent) gabber

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She gabbed with students about Saturday Night Live and whether Jessica Simpson was really as dumb as she appears on TV (she's not).
example.arg: about Saturday Night Live and whether Jessica Simpson was really as dumb as she appears on TV (she's not)

example.name: Gabbers in one constituent
example.text: He hugged his former player, and they gabbed about the past.
